    • Method Detail

      • labeled

        public static PImage labeled(ImageSInt32 image)
        Visualizes a labeled image. Each label is assigned a random color
        Parameters:
        image - Labeled input image
        Returns:
        Rendered color output image

      • colorizeSign

        public static PImage colorizeSign(ImageFloat32 src,
                  float maxAbsValue)
        Renders positive values as red and negative values as green. The intensity of the color is a linear function relative to the maximum intensity of the image.
        Parameters:
        src - Input image.
        maxAbsValue - The maximum absolute value of the image.
        Returns:
        Visualized image.

      • colorizeSign

        public static PImage colorizeSign(ImageInteger src,
                  int maxAbsValue)
        Renders positive values as red and negative values as green. The intensity of the color is a linear function relative to the maximum intensity of the image.
        Parameters:
        src - Input image.
        maxAbsValue - The maximum absolute value of the image.
        Returns:
        Visualized image.

      • labeled

        public static PImage labeled(ImageSInt32 image,
             int[] colors)
        Renders a labeled image with the provided lookup table for each region's RGB color.
        Parameters:
        image - Input labeled image
        colors - Color lookup table
        Returns:
        Visualized image

      • gradient

        public static PImage gradient(ImageFloat32 dx,
              ImageFloat32 dy)
        Renders the image gradient into a single output image. Each direction has a unique color and the intensity is dependent upon the edge's relative intensity
        Parameters:
        dx - Derivative x-axis
        dy - Derivative y-axis
        Returns:
        Visualized image

      • gradient

        public static PImage gradient(ImageSInt16 dx,

        Renders the image gradient into a single output image. Each direction has a unique color and the intensity is dependent upon the edge's relative intensity
        Parameters:

        dy - Derivative y-axis
        Returns:
        Visualized image
